message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're being too generous, I'll take a bit more!
I'm willing to compromise, but not too much
You're still being too soft, I'll take more this time!
I'm getting firmer, but still willing to compromise
You're getting desperate, I'll take most of it now!
I'm making a last stand, take it or leave it
You're making a huge mistake, I'm taking the majority!
I'm out of options, you can have it all
